text: Count Jan Wielopolski (died 1668) was a Polish noble (szlachcic). Son of District Judge and Podkomorzy Kasper Wielopolski and Elżbieta Broniewska. He was married to Zofia Kochanowska. He was a courtier from 1635, administrator of royal salt-pits in Bochnia from 1649, castellan of Wojnicz from 1655 and voivode of Kraków Voivodship from 1667. Starost of Biecz, Warsaw, Bochnia and Nowy Targ. Category:Polish Counts of the Holy Roman Empire Category:Counts of Poland Jan the elder Category:17th-century births Category:1688 deaths
title: Jan Wielopolski the elder
